item.title: Bin has been missed before weekend, 14th November
item.description:

item.title: Several flytipped areas, 14th November
item.description:

item.title: This crossing is unfit for use, not accessible, 14th November
item.description:
This temporary crossing is not suitable for everyone - it’s not stable and the ramps aren’t fitted so it’s not accessible for buggies or wheelchair users. When will the pavement be open on the other side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London

item.title: Leaves need to be cleared within Rydal Drive, Bexleyheath, 14th November
item.description:
Although we have swept up a large amount of the leaves that have fallen from the trees and filled our brown bins, there are still a very large amount that need removing. These are now becoming dangerous, particularly on the pathways when it is wet and pavements are uneven.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 212, Rydal Drive, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked pavement drains, 14th November
item.description:
